title: Ep 269 | The Fastest 75 Years Phil Ever Spent and Looking for Hope in the Wrong Places
description:
Phil just had a birthday and says there’s not that much happy about it. Jase looks at faith vs. science. The guys discuss how people look for hope in things like space exploration instead of God. They also dive into why bad things happen and whether or not cremation is biblical. And Al explains his approach to sharing Christ in his community.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
